mapper.select: select a.grp_cd , b.CD , b.NM , b.str from grp_code a , common_code b where a.grp_cd = 'menu_1' and a.GRP_CD = b.GRP_CD(+) order by b.ord_no

select c.GRP_CD as big_menu_cd , b.nm as big_menu_nm , d.cd as mid_menu_cd , d.nm as mid_menu_nm from grp_code a , common_code b , grp_code c , common_code d where a.grp_cd = 'menu_1' and a.GRP_CD = b.GRP_CD(+) and b.STR = c.grp_cd(+) and c.GRP_CD = d.GRP_CD(+) order by b.ord_no, d.ord_no
